an6.74:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.74:1.3: Kamavitakkam, byapadavitakkam, vihimsavitakkam, kamasannam, byapadasannam, vihimsasannam—
an6.74:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.74:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.74:2.3: Kamavitakkam, byapadavitakkam, vihimsavitakkam, kamasannam, byapadasannam, vihimsasannam—
an6.74:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitun”ti.
